item.title: EPUB to Conversational Audio: AI-Powered Podcast Generator
item.description: This script extracts text from an EPUB file, formats it, and converts it into an engaging audio podcast. It uses AI-based transcript generation, rewriting, and text-to-speech synthesis to create a conversational and captivating audio output. Here is the source code git clone https://github.com/namuan/llm-playground.git Pre-Requisites: MLX Qwen2.5 Models: These will be downloaded when the script runs for the first time. FIRST_PASS_LLM = "mlx-community/Qwen2.5-14B-Instruct-4bit" SECOND_PASS_LLM = "mlx-community/Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct-4bit" Although you can configure a different MLX model if you already have it downloaded.
